title: Featured Projects
description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on. Each project demonstrates different aspects of my technical skills and problem-solving abilities.

projects.title: Task Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive project management tool similar to Jira, featuring task tracking, user assignments, and real-time updates.
projects.challenges: Implementing real-time updates while maintaining application performance was a key challenge.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-featured online store with product management, shopping cart, and secure payment integration.
projects.challenges: Ensuring secure payment processing and optimizing the checkout flow for better conversion rates.

projects.title: Social Media Dashboard
projects.description: Analytics dashboard for social media metrics with data visualization and reporting features.
projects.challenges: Processing and visualizing large datasets while maintaining smooth user experience.
